--Prepare yourself a beverage for the loser to drink (I like to prepare a nice tasty shot). 

 --Choose how many players there will be. 

 --Choose your starting number ~ the lower the number the quicker the game. 

 --Decide who is player 1. It can be anyone, but probably not a dog. Try to play with humans if you can.. but i'm not your mum so I don't care. 

 --Click generate or skip your turn, if you generated a new number, and if your number is not 0 then you're safe, lucky you xx. If you skipped your turn then well, I think you know what that means. Watch out though, you only have one skip per game (really spooky)! 

 --Pass the phone to player 2, they then can either generate a number, or they can skip their turn. 

 --Once a player gets the number 0 then they are out, and they lose! Take that shot you little silly goose. 

 --Tada! You're done, if that game didn't bore you to death then play it again, and again, and again, literally do whatever you want, you're a free person so live your gorgeous life.
